amendatorysection.para: Obtaining a license constitutes sufficient contact with this state for the exercise of personal jurisdiction over the licensee in any action arising out of the licensee's activity in this state.

annotation.para: Service of process upon Director of Banking was proper in action to have installment loan declared void. McNish v. General Credit Corp., 164 Neb. 526, 83 N.W.2d 1 (1957).
